q: 4. Choose the word with the different underlined sound:

q: 7. Choose the word with different stress:
explain: Đáp án C 'potato' trọng âm 2. Broccoli(1), Mineral(1). Lemonade(3).

q: 8. Choose the word with different stress:
explain: Đáp án B 'favourite' trọng âm 1. Các từ còn lại trọng âm 2.

q: 9. Choose the word with different stress:
explain: Đáp án C 'activity' trọng âm 2. Các từ còn lại trọng âm 3.

explain: Đáp án D 'canoe' trọng âm 2. Các từ còn lại trọng âm 1.

q: 1. Salmon is a kind of _______.
explain: Salmon (cá hồi) là cá.

q: 2. We need some _______ to make a salad.
explain: Cà chua (tomatoes) dùng làm salad.

q: 3. I _______ breakfast with my family every morning.
explain: Have breakfast = Ăn sáng.

q: 4. Have you got any _______? I am so thirsty.
explain: Thirsty (khát) -> cần Water (nước).

q: 5. I love to eat a fresh _______ for breakfast.
explain: Ăn một quả táo (apple) tươi.

q: 6. Do you have _______ spaghetti?
explain: Câu hỏi nghi vấn thường dùng 'any'. Spaghetti là danh từ không đếm được.

q: 7. We eat _______ rice.
explain: 'Rice' là danh từ không đếm được, dùng 'a lot of'.

q: 8. Would you like _______ to drink?
explain: Lời mời mọc dùng 'something' (cái gì đó để uống không?).

q: 9. I eat _______ avocado every day.
explain: 'Avocado' bắt đầu bằng nguyên âm -> dùng mạo từ 'an'.

q: 10. They don't have _______ black grapes here.
explain: Câu phủ định (don't have) dùng 'any'.

q: 11. Does he play football _______ basketball?
explain: Câu hỏi lựa chọn giữa A hoặc B -> dùng 'or'.

q: 12. My son likes apples _______ he doesn't like grapes.
explain: Hai vế trái ngược nhau (thích... không thích) -> dùng 'but'.

q: 13. I need _______ pear and _______ orange.
explain: Pear (phụ âm) -> a pear. Orange (nguyên âm) -> an orange.

q: 14. Does she work as _______ manager?
explain: Chỉ nghề nghiệp (manager) -> dùng 'a'.

q: 15. Borough Market is world famous _______ it has visitors from many different countries.
explain: Bổ sung thông tin: Nổi tiếng VÀ có nhiều du khách -> 'and'.

q: 16. What five kinds _______ food can't you live without?
explain: Kinds of food (các loại thức ăn).

q: 17. When you feel unhappy _______ stressed, what type of food do you eat?
explain: Liệt kê trạng thái (không vui HOẶC căng thẳng) -> dùng 'or'.
Trạng từ chỉ tần suất (usually) đứng trước động từ thường (gets up).

q: 19. - How _______ do you exercise? - I go to the gym every day.
explain: Hỏi về mức độ thường xuyên (every day) -> How often.

q: 20. Nicola _______ on his computer for eight hours.
explain: Trạng từ chỉ tần suất đứng sau động từ to be -> is sometimes.

q: 21. _______ do their homework?
explain: Câu hỏi với 'They' dùng trợ động từ 'Do'. 'Always' đứng trước động từ chính.

q: 22. I _______ late for school.
explain: 'Never' đứng sau động từ to be (am).

q: 23. He _______ have breakfast at home.
explain: Vị trí trạng từ: Doesn't usually have.

q: 24. Why _______ go out with her?
explain: Câu hỏi phủ định: Why + doesn't + S + adv + V...?

q: 25. Stephan _______ ill.
explain: Trạng từ đứng sau to be -> is hardly ever (hiếm khi bị ốm).

q: 26. I usually get up early and go running, but not _______ the weekend.
explain: At the weekend (Anh-Anh) là đáp án phổ biến trong sách giáo khoa.

q: 27. He spends hours _______ social media every day.
explain: On social media (trên mạng xã hội).

q: 28. They always have some cheese _______ home.
explain: At home (ở nhà).

q: 29. I have a glass of milk and an apple _______ breakfast.
explain: For breakfast (cho bữa sáng).

q: 30. Exercise and good food are important _______ you if you want to keep fit.
explain: Important for you (quan trọng đối với bạn).

q: 31. We have a table _______ two for half past seven.
explain: A table for two (bàn cho 2 người).

q: 32. Would you like _______ to eat?
explain: Lời mời lịch sự dùng 'something'.

q: 33. It's important for you to spend time _______ your family or your friends.
explain: Spend time with someone (dành thời gian với ai).

q: 34. Are you ready _______?
explain: Ready + to V (sẵn sàng làm gì).

q: 35. Can I have _______ bread, please?
explain: Lời yêu cầu (Request) dùng 'some'.

q: 36. _______ we have some vegetable soup, please?
explain: 'Could we have...' là lời yêu cầu lịch sự.

q: 37. I'm sorry. We don't have _______ chicken left.
explain: Câu phủ định dùng 'any'.

q: 38. There are many websites about how _______ a good photo of food.
explain: How to + V (cách để làm gì).

q: 39. He doesn't like _______ for people.
explain: Like + V-ing (sở thích).

q: 40. Would you like _______ football?
explain: Would like + to V.

q: 41. Do you ever take photos _______ your food?
explain: Take photos of something (chụp ảnh cái gì).

q: 42. She loves _______ English.
explain: Love + V-ing (yêu thích làm gì).

q: 43. What do you like _______ on holiday?
explain: Like + V-ing.

q: 44. I hate _______ around the town center.
explain: Hate + V-ing.

q: 45. I enjoy _______ and I usually go on Sunday.
explain: Enjoy + V-ing (swimming).

q: 46. Oliver spends months _______ for the race.
explain: Spend time + V-ing.

q: 47. I often meet friends for coffee _______ we go shopping together.
explain: Diễn tả sự lựa chọn: Hoặc đi cafe hoặc đi mua sắm (Or).

q: 48. He likes buying food _______ big shops.
explain: At shops (Tại cửa hàng).

q: 49. At the moment, I am happy _______ I am hungry. Time for dinner!
explain: Hạnh phúc NHƯNG đói bụng (nghĩa tương phản) -> but.

q: 50. If you want _______ fit and healthy, eat much vegetable...
explain: Want + to V (muốn làm gì).

q:
Passage 1: The internet has hundreds of websites with thousands of photos...

1. How many sites are named in the passage?
explain: Trong bài nhắc tên 4 trang: FoodSpotting, SnapDish, InstaFood, Instagram.

q: 2. Why is the food in one website called 'rainbow food'?
options: The food is good when there is a rainbow.
The food is in a picture with a rainbow.
The food with different colours is on one plate.
The food plate has a picture of a rainbow.
explain: Text: 'red, orange, yellow, green... all on one plate' (Thức ăn có nhiều màu khác nhau trên cùng một đĩa).

q: 3. According to the passage, which statement is TRUE?
options: To make a good photo of food, the food needs to be bright.
To make a good photo of food, the food needs to be pink.
Some websites teach people how to cook good food.
explain: Text: 'the most important thing is that the food is bright and colourful'.

q:
Passage 2: Every year, the people of Okanogan County...

4. What do people of Okanogan County do to celebrate the end of summer?
explain: Text: 'have a fair to celebrate the end of summer' (Tổ chức hội chợ).

q: 5. Which statement is TRUE about the Indian Relay Race?
options: People drive their cars in the race.
People use it to celebrate the beginning of summer.
People ride one horse in the race.
It is a traditional American Indian race.
explain: Text: 'a tradition of American Indians'.

q:
Passage 3: In Quebec, we have a big festival every winter...

6. What does the writer think of the Winter Carnival?
explain: Text: 'It's really good fun' (Thực sự rất vui) -> Thích nó.

q: 7. Which activity does the writer like best in the Winter Carnival?
explain: Text: 'My favourite thing is the evening parade'.

q:
Passage 4: My favourite healthy food is Moqueca...

8. What is the main ingredient of Moqueca?
explain: Text: 'It's a fish soup'.

q:
Passage 5: My favourite healthy food is a fruit salad...

9. How many kinds of fruit does the writer usually use to make this fruit salad?
explain: Text: 'strawberries, melon and pears' -> 3 loại.

q:
Passage 2 (continued): The race lasts 52 days...

10. According to the passage, which statement is FALSE?
options: People run from 6 a.m. until midnight.
People rest for six hours each day.
People need to be strong and healthy to join the race.
explain: Text: 'The race lasts 52 days'. Đáp án B nói 'kết thúc trước 52 ngày' là SAI.

q:
Passage 1 (continued): There are websites about how to take a good photo...

11. What does the passage say about pasta and noodles?
explain: Text: 'Pasta or noodles always look good'.

q:
Passage 3 (continued):

12. What are the ice sculptures often about?
explain: Text: 'artists often make ice animals and buildings'.

q: 13. What do people do in the canoe race?
options: They have a race on the icy river.
explain: Text: 'They race on the icy river'.

q:
Passage 4 (continued):

14. Which of the following food isn't there in Moqueca?
explain: Bài đọc liệt kê: fish, red peppers, onions or other vegetables. Không có 'meat' (thịt).

q:
Passage 5 (continued):

15. What does the writer use in his fruit salad when there are no oranges?
explain: Text: 'when I don't have any [oranges], I add a little bit of lemonade'.

q:
Passage 2 (continued):

16. Why do runners need to visit the doctor before they join the race?
explain: Text: 'enter to check they are strong and healthy'.

q:
Passage 6: My name is Darcey and I'm from Australia...

17. What nationality is Darcey?
explain: Text: 'I'm from Australia'.

q: 18. When does the author have lessons at university?
explain: Text: 'on Monday morning, Tuesday morning and Thursday morning'.

q: 19. What does the author do when he/she doesn't have lessons at university?
options: He/she studies at home or in the library.
explain: Text: 'On Wednesday and Friday... study at home... or I go to the university library'.

q: 20. Why does the author check his messages and emails every day?
options: to see pictures of his/her sister's and friends' lives
to send pictures of his work to friends
to get information about his homework
to watch online videos about Australia
explain: Text: 'like sending me some pictures of their lives'.

q: 21. Darcey wants to work in _______.
explain: Text: 'maybe in Singapore or Japan'.

q: 22. She doesn't have any classes on _______.
explain: Text: 'On Wednesday and Friday, I get up later and study...' (Tức là không có lớp).

q: 23. Darcey goes to the library when her friends _______.
explain: Text: 'flatmates play music or video games'.

q: 24. At the weekend, Darcey chats to her _______.
explain: Text: 'my parents and I always talk online on Saturday or Sunday'.

q: 25. Darcey and her friends don't usually eat at restaurants because _______.
explain: Text: 'don't go out to restaurants because they are expensive' (đắt đỏ = not cheap).

q: 1. 'Good evening, do you have a reservation?' - '_______'
options: Yes, we have a table for two for half past seven.
No, I'd like to have a chicken.
explain: Trả lời xác nhận đã đặt bàn.

q: 2. 'Are you ready to order?' - '_______'
options: Yes. For a starter, can we have a salad, please?
Yes. Can we have the bill, please?
Yes. A table for two, please.
explain: Đã sẵn sàng gọi món -> Gọi món khai vị (starter).

q: 3. 'Would you like something to drink?' - '_______'
options: Can I have chicken soup, please?
Coke is not good for health.
Could I have some sparkling water, please?
explain: Hỏi về đồ uống -> Gọi nước có ga (sparkling water).

q: 4. 'What would you like for the main course?' - '_______'
options: No, thanks. Could we have the bill, please?
explain: Hỏi món chính -> Gọi món gà.

q: 5. '_______' - 'Can I have some green peas, please?'
options: What would you like for dessert?
What would you like to drink?
explain: Câu trả lời là gọi đậu xanh (một loại rau) -> Câu hỏi là 'Bạn muốn gọi rau gì?'

q: 6. 'Good evening. How can I help you?' - '_______'
options: We need a table for two.
explain: Nhân viên chào khách -> Khách trả lời nhu cầu (Cần bàn cho 2 người).

q: 7. 'How often do you check your email?' - '_______'
explain: Hỏi tần suất (How often) -> Trả lời số lần (Twice a day).

q: 8. 'What types of fruit do you like?' - '_______'
options: I eat an apple every day.
Can I have one more apple, please?
Is an onion a type of fruit?
explain: Hỏi loại quả yêu thích -> Trả lời 'Rất thích táo'.

q: 9. 'Do you spend a lot of time online?' - '_______'
options: No, I don't like talking online.
Yes, I am. I'm a blogger.
explain: Hỏi có dành nhiều thời gian online không -> 'Có, tôi online suốt'.

q: 10. 'Do you like watching TV?' - '_______'
options: I'd like to have a large screen TV, please.
Sometimes. It depends on the programme.
I don't like listening to music.
explain: Hỏi sở thích xem TV -> 'Thỉnh thoảng, tùy thuộc vào chương trình'.

q: 11. Customer: 'Could we have some vegetable soup, please?' - Waiter: '_______'
explain: Khách yêu cầu món -> Nhân viên đáp lại lịch sự 'Vâng, chắc chắn rồi'.

q: 12. What do you say to order some fish in a restaurant?
explain: Cách gọi món: 'I'd like...' (Tôi muốn...)

q: 13. What does a waiter say to ask a customer about his order for a drink?
options: What do you usually drink in the evening?
What do you drink with your meal?
What would you like to drink?
explain: Câu hỏi lịch sự của bồi bàn: 'Bạn muốn uống gì?'

q: 14. 'How often do you have English lessons?' - '_______'
options: English is good for your future job.
I learn English twice a week.
explain: Hỏi tần suất -> Trả lời '2 lần một tuần' (twice a week).

q: 15. 'What does Jane do to relax?' - '_______'
explain: Hỏi làm gì để thư giãn -> Trả lời sở thích 'Chơi game'.
